subdisciplines.name: Documentary Photojournalism
subdisciplines.description: The practice of photographically documenting news, events, and social issues in order to convey a message to a broad audience.

subdisciplines.name: Editorial Photojournalism
subdisciplines.description: The practice of photographically documenting news events, particularly in print media.

subdisciplines.name: Street Photography
subdisciplines.description: A genre of photography that captures candid moments of everyday life in public spaces.
